body.name: YXP Women's Winter Thicken Military Parka Jacket Warm Fleece Cotton Coat with Fur Hood
features: Superior Fabric: Shell: 100% Cotton, Lining: 100% Polyester Sherpa Lined. High quality material, skin friendly, soft, breathable and comfortable to wear, no pilling, no fading

Warm & Windproof: The winter coat adopts thick padded outshell, Sherpa lined provides ultra warmth. Front zipper plus snap buttons closure, the hood with adjustable drawstring & stand collar give you maximum against wind & freezing protection
Big Pockets: 2 Unique-Design big snap patch pockets, great for keys, phone, wallet, cash and other small items

Fashion Design: The hood with removable zip-off fur, more convenience to clean. Adjustable drawstring waist better to show your curvesgive, and more space in the waist part for a flattering fit in winter, slim fit

Casual Military Style: Military jacket with casual look, classic and timeless. Fit in the Winter, Autumn. Perfect for office or home daily wearing, and also good for traveling, hiking, clmibing, camping, shopping or other ocasation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YXP focuses on the production and sales of warm and windproof adult cotton jackets, always pursuing higher quality. Our aim is to offer competitive items that have fashionable designs and high quality at both fairly and reasonable prices all the time.

Easy Care & Wash: Fade-resistant and stain-resistant feature. Mild twist, No steam, Do not bleach, Do not tumble dry, Medium iron, Line dry in shade, Machine wash maximum temperature of 30°C, Dry cleaning, normal process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super warm and super cute!
reviews.reviewText: Love the fit, the look, the fur trim, and cozy soft liner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super warm I absolutely love it.
reviews.reviewText: It is 18 degrees Fahrenheit currently and windy. I’m very warm wearing the coat. I have wide shoulders and have good movement in this coat which I was worried I wouldn't have. The material feels like a carhart but not as stiff. Kind of like men’s dickies work pants. I included close up of the material if it helps. Hopefully it’s as durable as it feels. The hood is amazing at blocking face from the wind as well. The pockets are awkwardly placed I wish it was more to the side for easy hand placement. However I can place 2 regular sized water bottles (so you can get how roomy they are) in each pocket and it is fantastic. I like that the fur on the hood zippers on and off easily. It is also exactly as pictured and described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: DO NOT buy 2 sizes bigger! 5’3 145-150lbs. Bra size 38 DD. A lot of the reviews said to buy two sizes up. I am usually between a medium and large. So bought the XL … it was ridiculously huge. I returned it for a large, which is still too big, but I am keeping it so the jacket doesn’t get tight with a bulky sweater and my heated vest. I love the color of this coat. It is soft and warm. I wish it was just a bit warmer on really cold days doing teacher recess duty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, heavy material and amazing hood
reviews.reviewText: This coat feels heavy and warm - I did NOT want the windbreaker material some are made of and this didn't have it, so I was really happy. I got a large, I'm 5'4" & 170lbs. I don't feel like I'm swimming in it but I could wear a hoodie under it, no problem. I like that it is a bit longer too so it covers my waist.My FAVORITE thing is how deep the hood. The lining doesn't feel cheap or icky. Plus, I can wear my hair up and still cover my face from the wind. I haven't tested it out in the elements yet but I'm really happy with the quality and size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price. Awkward pocket openings are small.
reviews.reviewText: I'm pleased with this purchase overall. It's warm enough and has a very soft and cozy lining on the inside of the coat. The zipper part under the neck is a little scratchy but it probably won't be a problem if wearing a scarf. Also, the fur around the hood for me is not my style and I am happy to say removal was easy and it still looks good without it. Disappointed by packaging/arrival because it was STUFFED into a plastic bag for shipping and is still extremely wrinkled as a result over a week later... not slight wrinkles... like ball up a piece of paper and the open it back up wrinkles. washign and drying and then if not just taking to the cleaners this weekend. Also, it takes on fuzz, lent and pet hair pretty easily. I never need a lent roller, yet I'm constantly pulling stuff off this coat. Last issue which is the biggest for me is pocket design. No biggy for most people probably. But, as someone who likes to walk with their hands in their pockets (holding my phone in my pocket and ready to grab pepper spray while commuting through the city at night). The pockets are deep enough to hold what's needed (phone, wallet, keys etc). However, they are placed directly in the front on either side of the zipper and the opening of the pockets are not very wide. So when it's cold and you put your hands in the only pockets, they are so small and awkward, that they force your sweater/shirt sleeves to raise and expose your bare wrist to the cold. That's my number one complaint because even with gloves, part of my wrist/arm is exposed because it also pushes up sweater sleeves underneath the coat. Overall it's good for the price (hence 4 starts instead of 3), but I would not purchase in another color as I planned to do. Gonna stick with it, so it's not too bad... just giving a heads up to others of the good and bad.UPDATE: It’s now one month later. I stopped wearing this coat completely. About 2 weeks after the review, I got sick of the lent issue. After washing it and hoping the dryer cycle would help, it just got even worse and more dull looking. It’s a horrible material for a coat (…the black part on the outside. The brown fuzzy lining is still very soft and cozy.) I can’t describe it, but it just reminds me of a cheap pillowcase. I changed it from 4 to 3 stars and it will be donated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Heartbroken and embarrassed to wear.
reviews.reviewText: I'm honestly pretty crushed over this purchase. I've never left a negative review for a product in my life and have debated for a few months to do one. I also never knew the jackets had pores. Ever since I started to wear this jacket the literal fluff inside of it continually seeps out of the "pores" of the jacket daily. Nothing can keep this from happening. I've used a lint roller and what does come off is replaced with double the amount by the next day. I spent a good deal money, thinking I was buying a really nice jacket since I moved to a very cold winter location. What crushed me aside from the absolute embarrassment and the way this jacket makes me feel incredibly self conscious when I wear it is that this would have been the perfect jacket for me. The color was beautiful, the warmth is amazing and so is the length. When I first unwrapped it the fur on the hood was wicked matted but I got over that quickly even though I love and wanted that look for the hood. This issue on the other hand makes me look unkempt and unfortunately is the only jacket I have to wear. It's too late for a return and I'm just so disappointed and spent a good deal of money on this product. I wish I could just get a refund so I can get a different one and not feel embarrassed everytime I have to go outside or anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a beautiful coat.
reviews.reviewText: This coat is just gorgeous. I ordered a brown coat, and everything about it was just right. The zipper in front worked well, the hood with the furry ruff is absolutely beautiful. The drawstring at the waist is perfect, it makes it fit really well and keeps the drafts out. The pockets are really handy, I love the double pockets on each side. I thought I'd need something a little more substantial in the long run, but, probably, I'll end up ordering another one of these coats, it looks just great, very, very flattering, pretty, great coat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This coat is AMAZING!
reviews.reviewText: Best purchase I have made in a long time. This coat is amazing. It's stylish, warm, extremely comfortable and well made. It is just as described. The color is perfect. It is so warm and comfortable, perfect for the winters up here in Northern NH. I am so glad I decided to purchase this.
Perfect fit and nice and warm
Preciosa y súper abrigada. Estoy muy contenta.
Llegó totalmente arrugado, las arrugas no se quitan con nada.... Es horrible el peluche, afortunadamente se puede quitar...
Bonne matière, et prix très bas étant donné la qualité.Très chaud, fait exclusivement pour l'hiver et pas l'automne

reviews.reviewTitle: Hält warm und sieht gut aus
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe die Jacke eine Nummer größer gekauft weil es mir geraten wurde und im Winter weiß man ja nie mit dicken Strickjacken usw. Sie passt gut. Ist nicht zu eng und gute Bewegungsfreiheit. Sie kann an der Taille mit Schnüren enger gemacht werden, so dass man auch eine Taille formen kann. Der künstliche Pelz ist bei mir gleich weg geflogen. Das Fell im Inneren ist super weich und angenehm. Die Tasche sind nur von oben offen aber das ist nur ein kleines Manko, was mich nicht großartig stört.
